Title: CodeRay - MVVM Debugger
Description: CodeRay is a utility that shows a WPF application's view-view model architecture in a tree-structured layout and displays in real-time databinding updates.
HomeWiki:
CodeRay is a WPF debugging/documentation utility that displays an application's MVVM architecture in a tree-structured layout and also reports in real-time all data binding updates.

This capability requires minor changes to the client WPF application.

CodeRay will not work with WPF frameworks such as Prism and Caliburn-Micro.

A sample CodeRay screen is shown below.  In the tree, the view models are in blue, the view model collections in green, and the views in red.  In the data grid, real-time databinding updates are displayed.
